###  ***shinyBN*** is an R/Shiny application for interactive inference and visualization of Bayesian network.

#### It's based on two R packages:
> + [`bnlearn`](http://www.bnlearn.com/):  Structure learning, parameter training and network inference
> + [`visNetwork`](http://datastorm-open.github.io/visNetwork/):  Network visualization
